summary: It's 1959 in a seedy bar in Philadelphia, and Billie Holiday is giving one of her last performances interlaced with salty, often humorous, reminiscences to project a riveting portrait of the lady and her music 4 months before her death.
cast: Audra McDonald|Shelton Becton|George Farmer|Clayton Craddock|Roxie|Debra Crowe|David Michael Cefalu
title: Lady Day at Emerson's Bar & Grill
